text.section: A merger shall take effect upon the effective date and time of the articles of merger as provided in KRS 14A.2-070.

A plan of merger approved in accordance with KRS 386A.7-020 may effect any amendment to the certificate of trust or governing instrument of a statutory trust if it is the surviving constituent organization. An approved plan of merger may also provide that the governing instrument of any constituent statutory trust to the merger, including a statutory trust formed for the purpose of consummating a merger, shall be the governing instrument of the statutory trust that is the surviving constituent organization. Any amendment to a certificate of trust or governing instrument or adoption of a new governing instrument made pursuant to this subsection shall be effective at the effective date and time of the merger.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 59, effective July 12, 2012.
